category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 13 (Industrial Safety and Health Committee)
contents: Article 13 (Industrial Safety and Health Committee) ① The Chairman establishes and operates the Occupational Safety and Health Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Industrial Safety Committee) in accordance with the Industrial Safety Act and the collective agreement. ② The composition and operation of the Industrial Safety Committee are governed by the Enforcement Decree of the Industrial Safety Act. Pursuant to Article 35., ③ Other details necessary for the operation of the National Security Commission shall be separately determined by the National Security Commission.
